column4: How do I make ubuntu auto-update (i.e. not ask me to update things)
I just want it to update everything automatically.
that's a poor idea, but if you want to, you need to edit cron to run something like apt-get update ; apt-get upgrade -y
well apt-get doesn't have a log, so if something screws up, you don't know what, whereas if you approve the updates, you will at least know the offending application
